001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.time.LocalDate;
005import java.time.LocalTime;
006import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Objects;
010import java.util.stream.Collectors;
011
012import javax.annotation.Nullable;
013
014import com.commercetools.api.models.MapAccessor;
015import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
016import com.commercetools.api.models.common.Reference;
017import com.commercetools.api.models.common.TypedMoney;
018import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributeLocalizedEnumValue;
019import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributePlainEnumValue;
020
021public class AttributesAccessor extends MapAccessor<Attribute> {
022
023    public AttributesAccessor(Map<String, Attribute> attributes) {
024        super(attributes);
025    }
026
027    public static AttributesAccessor of(ProductVariant variant) {
028        return new AttributesAccessor(AttributeAccessor.asMap(variant));
029    }
030
031    public static AttributesAccessor of(List<Attribute> attributes) {
032        return new AttributesAccessor(AttributeAccessor.asMap(attributes));
033    }
034
035    public static AttributesAccessor of(Map<String, Attribute> attributes) {
036        return new AttributesAccessor(attributes);
037    }
038
039    @Nullable
040    public LocalDate asDate(final String key) {
041        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asDate);
042    }
043
044    @Nullable
045    public LocalTime asTime(final String key) {
046        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asTime);
047    }
048
049    @Nullable
050    public ZonedDateTime asDateTime(final String key) {
051        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asDateTime);
052    }
053
054    @Nullable
055    public List<LocalDate> asSetDate(final String key) {
056        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetDate);
057    }
058
059    @Nullable
060    public List<LocalTime> asSetTime(final String key) {
061        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetTime);
062    }
063
064    @Nullable
065    public List<ZonedDateTime> asSetDateTime(final String key) {
066        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetDateTime);
067    }
068
069    @Nullable
070    public String asString(final String key) {
071        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asString);
072    }
073
074    @Nullable
075    public Boolean asBoolean(final String key) {
076        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asBoolean);
077    }
078
079    @Nullable
080    public Double asDouble(final String key) {
081        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asDouble);
082    }
083
084    @Nullable
085    public LocalizedString asLocalizedString(final String key) {
086        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asLocalizedString);
087    }
088
089    @Nullable
090    public AttributePlainEnumValue asEnum(final String key) {
091        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asEnum);
092    }
093
094    @Nullable
095    public AttributeLocalizedEnumValue asLocalizedEnum(final String key) {
096        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asLocalizedEnum);
097    }
098
099    @Nullable
100    public Long asLong(final String key) {
101        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asLong);
102    }
103
104    @Nullable
105    public Reference asReference(final String key) {
106        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asReference);
107    }
108
109    @Nullable
110    public TypedMoney asMoney(final String key) {
111        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asMoney);
112    }
113
114    @Nullable
115    public List<String> asSetString(final String key) {
116        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetString);
117    }
118
119    @Nullable
120    public List<Boolean> asSetBoolean(final String key) {
121        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetBoolean);
122    }
123
124    @Nullable
125    public List<Double> asSetDouble(final String key) {
126        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetDouble);
127    }
128
129    @Nullable
130    public List<LocalizedString> asSetLocalizedString(final String key) {
131        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetLocalizedString);
132    }
133
134    @Nullable
135    public List<AttributePlainEnumValue> asSetEnum(final String key) {
136        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetEnum);
137    }
138
139    @Nullable
140    public List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue> asSetLocalizedEnum(final String key) {
141        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetLocalizedEnum);
142    }
143
144    @Nullable
145    public List<Long> asSetLong(final String key) {
146        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetLong);
147    }
148
149    @Nullable
150    public List<Reference> asSetReference(final String key) {
151        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetReference);
152    }
153
154    @Nullable
155    public List<TypedMoney> asSetMoney(final String key) {
156        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetMoney);
157    }
158
159    @Nullable
160    public AttributesAccessor asNested(final String key) {
161        return AttributesAccessor.of(get(key, AttributeAccessor::asNested));
162    }
163
164    @Nullable
165    public List<AttributesAccessor> asSetNested(final String key) {
166        return Objects.requireNonNull(get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetNested))
167                .stream()
168                .map(AttributesAccessor::of)
169                .collect(Collectors.toList());
170    }
171}
